titles.title: 330 I Know Whom I Have Believed

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
C
I know not why
God's wondrous grace
To me He hath made known
Nor why unworthy Christ in love
Redeemed me for His own

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
But I know Whom I have believed
And am persuaded that He is able
To keep that which I've committed
Unto Him against that day

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I know not how
This saving faith
To me He did impart
Nor how believing in His Word
Wrought peace within my heart

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I know not how
The Spirit moves
Convincing us of sin
Revealing Jesus
Through the Word
Creating faith in Him

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
I know not what
Of good or ill
May be reserved for me
Of weary ways or golden days
Before His face I see

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
I know not when
My Lord may come
At night or noonday fair
Nor if I walk
The vale with Him
Or meet Him in the air
